query.description: (optional): true untuk force delete meskipun ada assignment yang menggunakan category ini (default: false)

request.description: Create achievement. Criteria is optional JSON object for achievement unlock conditions.
Update achievement. All fields are optional.

query.description: (optional): true untuk force delete meskipun ada users yang memiliki achievement ini (default: false)

request.description: Delete achievement. Use force=true to delete even if achievement has users.

query.description: (optional): Search by title or student name
(optional): Sort by grade, submittedAt, or title (default: submittedAt)

request.description: Export grades to Excel file. Teacher can export all data, Student can only export their own data.
Export grades to PDF file. Format can be 'summary' or 'detailed' (default: 'detailed'). Teacher can export all data, Student can only export their own data.
Export student report card as PDF. Student can only export their own report card, Teacher can export any student's report card.
